entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-03-22
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [EnC] PrivateImplementationDetails isn't supported in Edit and Continue #60328
  • Missing "variable is assigned but its value is never used" warning for assignment utilizing UTF8 String Literal #60319
  • await code fix / analyzer enhancement #60318
    Backlog
  • Do not allow targeted new expression when type is not apparant #60309
    Backlog
  • Find All References to NuGet package/Assembly #60307
    Backlog
  • Region should indent when within function #60306
    Backlog
  • Search for method names in classes using Solution Explorer search is not consistent in case-sensitivity #60305
    Backlog
  • "Extract method" - generated method with expression body if possible #60303
    Backlog
  • Refactor - surround highlighted text with Try/Catch #60302
    Backlog

Closed

  • Deadlock in project system #57857
    17.1
  • Extra config options for `IDE0037` #60083
    Backlog
  • Cannot use fix provider for the issues identified in RegisterCompilationAction #60155
  • Light bulb does not invoke code fix provider for diagnostics created in compilation end action #51653
    Backlog
  • TestMethodSpansWithAttributes in Emit test fails locally. #42528
  • CS8424 being raised on non-async iterators is too aggressive. #40893
    17.2
  • Improve CS8603: "Possible null reference return" for String.IsNullOrWhiteSpace check #60304
  • [MetadataAsSource] Decompilation can end up showing the wrong source language #60253
    17.2
  • TestNullCoalesce_Dynamic test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60059
    17.2
  • LocalRewriter adds placeholder of wrong type when building `runtime` repo #58176
    17.2
  • NullCoalescingOperatorWithTupleNames test asserts if `GetEmitDiagnostics` call added #60046
    Compiler.Next
  • Unexpected scoping on type parameter of local function #59775
    17.2

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not run CI for non code files #60327
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Adjust DefiniteAssignmentPass.WriteConsideredUse for UTF8 String Literals. #60326
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Utf8StringLiterals
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1676641 #60325
    auto-merge
  • Test bitness #60324
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix our x86 test execution #60323
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [LSP] Remove isFinalized from semantic tokens logic #60322
    Area-IDE
  • Remove unreported telemetry #60321
    Area-IDE
  • Fix issue when multiple different diagnostics share a single fixer #60317
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60314
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add support for CheckedStatement for smart break line #60308
    Area-IDE

Merged

  • [semi-auto-props]: Fix speculative semantic model scenarios #59767
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Check for reference assembly before deciding which language to show #60271
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 1674979 #60301
    auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60320
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add basic TS LSP server #59639
    Area-IDE, LSP, Next
  • Fix XLF files that were manually edited #60312
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60316
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix conversion issues in null coalescing operator #60202
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Fix type parameter scoping for local functions #60098
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60310
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #60300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update SDK version in docs, etc. #60299
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.3 #60291
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #60295
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Always try to use cached data for import completion even if outdated #59760
    Area-IDE, Next

Updated

  • Remove enableRoslynAnalyzers from codespace default settings #60203
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix top-level speculation #60274
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Don't offer convert to switch when an implicit cast is present #60224
    Area-IDE
  • Check accessibility before offering "Implement interface" codefix #60297
    Area-IDE, Community
  • Updating our DiaSymReader.Native support #60290
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Initialize MEF parts before switching to the UI thread #60289
    Area-IDE
  • Add analyzer/fixer that notifies people about explicit (but hidden) casts the compiler generates for foreach-statements. #60120
    Area-IDE
  • Improve error message for unmatched override that uses 'T?' #55624
    Area-Compilers
  • Don't add async modifier for non-awaitable return method #55983
    Area-IDE
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Implicit field initialization in struct constructors #59788
    Area-Compilers
